item.title: NEED help with my TOS page
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

done it for you.
just you need to change the cookie site name ect you would laugh what was up…lol

tos page

<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
<head>
<?php

$cookie = $_COOKIE['distracted'];

if ($cookie == 'yes') {

header('Location: news.php'); // redirect to forums
} else{
}
?>
<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=iso-8859-1" />
<title>TOS Agreement</title>
<style type="text/css">
<!--
body,td,th {
	font-family: Verdana;
	color: #000000;
}
body {
	background-color: #333333;
}
a:link {
	text-decoration: none;
}
a:visited {
	text-decoration: none;
}
a:hover {
	text-decoration: underline;
}
a:active {
	text-decoration: none;
}
.style2 {color: #FFFFFF}
.style3 {font-size: 10px}
-->
</style>
<link href="Get Distracted.tk/core.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />
<style type="text/css">
<!--
.style4 {font-size: 12px}
.style5 {font-size: 12px; color: #FFFFFF; }
-->
</style>
</head>

<body>
<div align="center">
  <table width="600" height="175" border="0">
    <tr>
      <td height="171" bgcolor="#999999"><p class="style4"><strong>By entering the site or hitting I Agree. You agree to ALL the terms listed below.</strong> <br />
      These terms and conditions of entry apply to http://Distracted2.freehostia.com (Distracted2.tk) And all contents within the site. </p>
        <p class="style4">You agree that you are not apart of any anti-piracy group  you are not an acquaintance, family member or friend of any person(s) in any  form of an anti-piracy group.</p>
        <p class="style4">You are not part of any law enforcement group you are not an  acquaintance, family member or friend of any person(s) in any form of a law  enforcement group. </p>
        <p class="style4">The author(s) do not condone to any illegal activities in  any form at any time at any place. All content on the site is for educational  and entertainment purposes only and is not to be carried out. Any content  carried it is done at your own risk and you accept all consequences or results  of following any guides within the site.</p>
        <p class="style4">The author(s) do not take credit or claim legal ownership  for any work put on the site unless stated otherwise. If stated otherwise all  work is allowed to be distributed at will. All links for downloads are merely  links and are not hosted on this server. </p>
        <p class="style4">I reserve the right to ban any user at any time for any  reason. If you take offence easily or are light-hearted it is recommended you  do not enter the site. If you do not agree to 1 or more of these terms you are  not to enter the site. If you do you are not legally on the site and are  breaking the TOS.</p>        
        <p class="style3"> </p>      </td>
    </tr>
  </table>
  <br />
  <table width="600" height="82" border="0">
    <tr>
      <td bgcolor="#999999" class="style3"><p class="style4">By using, registering or reading the forums you agree to these terms. All the terms stated above still apply.</p>
        <p class="style4">1. You will not talk about things you don't know; you are to  be informative, not uninformative</p>
        <p class="style4">2. You will not make spelling mistakes on purpose to shorten  sentences, you should use "you" not "u" and "why"  not "y" etc.</p>
        <p class="style4">3. You should not make posts, comments or replies that  contain useless information. These include and are not limited to; Cool, lol,  yeah, I agree, lmao etc. These posts are pointless and are not useful for  anyone. </p>
        <p class="style4">4. You will not bump or double post.</p>
        <p class="style4">5. You should respect other people and other communities.  You should not flame each other or other communities. </p>
        <p class="style4">6. This community does not care about post count alone. If  someone has a high post count but most of it is spam we do not like them. If  they have informative posts we love him/her.</p>
        <p class="style4">7. You will not advertise any other sites without permission first from me or another mod or adminstrator.</p>
      <p class="style4">8. You must be over 13 to register on the forums. </p></td>
    </tr>
  </table>
</div>
<div align="center">//delete that <
  <form method="post" action="setcookie.php">
    <label> </label>
    <label> <span class="style2 style4">If you agree to ALL the terms and you are over the age of 13; please type yes and hit I Agree. Else leave the site. </span><br />
    <span class="style5">You must have cookies enabled for this to work. </span><br />
    <input name="agree" type="text" id="agree" maxlength="3" /><br />
    <input type="submit" name="Submit" value="I Agree" />
    </label>
    <br />
    <label>
    </label>
  </form>
</div>
<p> </p>
</body>
</html>

cookie page save it as setcookie.php

<?php /* add action="agreement.php" to your form */

if($_POST['agree'] == 'yes') { //your random comment i deleted

	setcookie("distracted", "yes", time()+3600*24*30, "/", "www.mylocalhost.com", 0); 
} else 
  header('Location: yourtospage.php')
?>

what was up is first at the top the second location redirecting you back to the tos page should not be there because it would just be like a loop like is there a cookie “no” re direct to tospage.php is there a cookie no redirect to tospage get it…

then the post you had the submits wrong and the names the name was agree not agreed =p that one made me laugh then just a change of a cookie and a few deletes and it worked i think you can take it from there feel free to put the setcookie page back in to the tos page if you still get a prob post it back here and ill fix but it should be all striate forward

N00b1

item.title: NEED help with my TOS page
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

<?php /* add action="ThisScript.php" to your form */ if($_POST['agreed'] == 'yes') { // text name should be agreed, value must be yes to proceed setcookie('myname', 'agreed'); } else { die('Idiot'); } ?>

your forums or whatever page should be secured:

<?php if ($_COOKIE['myname'] == 'yes') { header('Location: yourforums.htm'); // redirect to forums } else { exit; // dont execute any further code } ?>

Beer in mind i just wrote this out of my head so there might be some parse errors
